thread.title: Moderate traffic, lesser accidents in UAE today
thread.title_full: Moderate traffic, lesser accidents in UAE today

title: Moderate traffic, lesser accidents in UAE today
text:
Smooth traffic in UAE, no major accidents reported Web Team Filed on February 15, 2017 | Last updated on February 15, 2017 at 08.59 am Share 
(khaleej Times) Look out for the usual traffic spots in your city. It looks like officer-goers have one thing less to worry about this morning as the traffic is moderate on most roads. Sharjah is blocked with traffic on Al Wahda street, all the way till Al Qiyadah metro station but it is slowly clearing up. In Dubai, the traffic is at the usual places like the World Trade Centre roundabout and areas around Al Safa street. The Abu Dhabi traffic police has put out information about an accident on Sheikh Zayed Road after Reem Island but it has been cleared 08:42 - Accident on Shk Zayed St after Reem island exit inbound cleared @stscabudhabi #uaetraffic
